name: A Light Climb
description:
Made by:

  • Sappels
  • Lavisch
  • Jonteitch
Don't fall, you might regret it.

A small game made for IDX/GDT March Game Jam '23 hosted by Chalmers University and Gothenburg University.

The game features one single mechanic, a black hole used to slingshot the player around the map. Play with your mouse!

March Game Jam 23'
